songs.lyrics:
[Chorus] [Brijesh Shrestha]
Feri k aaulo tyo din
Jun Nepal ma haasda chhin
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula tyo din
Jaba hunchhau hami sab ek
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula

[Verse 1] [Yama Buddha]
Ah, yaha sabai ma rish chha
Daiba ko haar yaha daityi le jitchha
Yestai nai bichitra rit chha
Bijuli batti byavasthapanma varsau nai bitchha
Ani tapailai kasto chha, thik chha
Yaha hasera nichchha, ijjat nai bikchha
Hami haru bich nai bhibhinna hit chha
Kaam kuro thappa sadak ma bhid chha
Tara ma sakdina para pachadi hatdina
Aba ashakta awastha ma aaram gardai basdina
Sabai dhongi thhunchhu, ma neta seta gandina
Ma dhani garib bhandina, ma farak byawahar gardina
Ma ek Nepali hun, yo mero desh ho
Afnai lai marchhas aba k yo tero desh ho
Nara panchhi ko haaso doordasha desh ko
Sabai lai khalto ma halera purnu nai besh ho

[Chorus] [Brijesh Shrestha]
Feri k aaulo tyo din
Jun Nepal ma haasda chhin
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula tyo din
Jaba hunchhau hami sab ek
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula

[Verse 2] [Yama Buddha]
Hidhnu chha ajhai dherai gantabya pugna
Chaina samay prashasta masta sutna
Wa khana hagna mutna, dhila vaisakyo
Chandrama pugeko yantra phirta vaisakyo
Tara hami ajhai prithvi ma chhau
Rajya rahena tara hami prithvi ka hau
Buddha Bhrikuti ka hau, yesto stithi ma chhau
Shahid ko sapana bahira, brikriti machhau
Kahile kahi lagchha ma bhid maajh haraudai chhu
Eklai bahiraharu ko samaaj ma karaudai chhu
Afai afno sano sansar banaudai chhu
Ma dher janne haru sanga darauda chhu
K timi yo duniya sanga eklai ladna sakchhau
Pari aayema chhati bhari goli thapna sakchhau
Aafno aatma samman ko lagi hasdai marna sakchhau
Ke antim samay samma afno pariwar ko rakshya garna sakchhau

[Chorus] [Brijesh Shrestha]
Feri k aaulo tyo din
Jun Nepal ma haasda chhin
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula tyo din
Jaba hunchhau hami sab ek
Feri k aaula
Feri k aaula
songs.title: Yaha Sabaima Ris Chha
